recommendations_information.explanatory_text: Recommendations that can be followed simultaneously without the risk of negative interactions

recommendations.explanatory_text: exerciseDecreasesFatigueRecommend recommends action stdExerciseTherapy which will decrease fatigueLevel. This will result in normal fatigueLevel

interactions.explanatory_text: sabaSamaMaintainsMildCopdRecommend with action SabaSama and effect maintain AirflowLimitation was considered as a repetition recommendation but exerciseDecreasesFatigueRecommend is acceptable as is
